topPRs.title: feat: implement structured logging
topPRs.author: standujar
topPRs.body:
Prior merge of: https://github.com/elizaOS/eliza/pull/6169

## Summary
- Standardize all logs to structured format as eliza monorepo
- Add ESLint with `@elizaos/structured-logging` rule
- Add `lint:check` script for CI

## Test plan
- [x] Build passes

* **Refactor**
  * Replaced console messages with structured, contextual logging across the plugin for clearer diagnostics
* **Tests**

topPRs.title: fix: resolve TypeScript errors for @elizaos/core 1.7.x compatibility
topPRs.author: 0xbbjoker
topPRs.body:
## Summary
- Remove deprecated `serverId` from `ensureConnection` calls
- Cast `serverId` to `UUID` in Room/World objects for type safety
- Fix custom event payload typing for `emitEvent` calls
- Fix `MessagePayload` to use proper `Memory` object
- Update test type handling

## Version
Bumps to `1.6.4` for npm release

ü§ñ Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

<!-- CURSOR_SUMMARY -->
---

> [!NOTE]
> **Core updates and version bump**
> 
> - Upgrade dependencies to `@elizaos/core@^1.7.2` and `@elizaos/config@^1.7.2`; bump package version to `1.6.4`.
> 
> **Type and API compatibility changes**
> 
> - Remove deprecated `serverId` from `ensureConnection` calls; cast `serverId` to `UUID` on `World`/`Room` objects.
> - Enforce UUID typing for IDs (e.g., `userId`, `serverId`, `chatId`) and adjust function signatures (e.g., `batchProcessEntities` no longer takes `serverId`).
> 
> **Event payload fixes**
> 
> - Standardize `emitEvent` calls: use string enum values, include `runtime`/`source`, and emit `EventType.MESSAGE_SENT` with the created `Memory` instead of raw content.
> - Update Telegram-specific events (`SLASH_START`, `ENTITY_JOINED`, `MESSAGE_SENT`) to new payload shapes.
> 
> **Testing adjustments**
> 
> - Tighten `validateChatId` return type/guards and pass string chat IDs to `getFileId`; minor test robustness improvements.
> 
> <sup>Written by [Cursor Bugbot](https://cursor.com/dashboard?tab=bugbot) for commit 5a0aaa9fc7556022f6d68ea12ba5b7006ef9a2dd. This will update automatically on new commits. Configure [here](https://cursor.com/dashboard?tab=bugbot).</sup>
<!-- /CURSOR_SUMMARY -->

<!-- This is an auto-generated comment: release notes by coderabbit.ai -->

## Summary by CodeRabbit

* **Chores**
  * Bumped package version to 1.6.4.
  * Updated core dependencies to latest versions for improved stability and compatibility.
  
* **Refactor**
  * Improved internal event handling and message payload structures.
  * Streamlined connection management across platform services.

<sub>‚úèÔ∏è Tip: You can customize this high-level summary in your review settings.</sub>

<!-- end of auto-generated comment: release notes by coderabbit.ai -->

topContributors.summary: 0xbbjoker: Focused on maintenance and compatibility, merging two pull requests including a version bump for release in elizaos-plugins/plugin-discord#44 and a fix for TypeScript errors in elizaos-plugins/plugin-telegram#24, demonstrating a primary focus on other work and bugfix work across code, config, and tests.
madjin: Focused on bugfix work, making 2 commits that modified 2 files with a net addition of 4 lines, and also provided one approval review.

borisudovicic: Focused on product definition and refinement, creating three issues including one to remove a timer in the app builder (elizaos/eliza#6385) and two that were closed related to public agent link formats and agent discovery modules (elizaos/eliza#6304, elizaos/eliza#6302).
